name: CIL Charging Schedule and Instalment Policy

notes: In Discussion
We currently have no plans to introduce a Community Infrastructure Levy

The Council will consider whether CIL is necessary to deliver the proposals set out in the new Local Plan, but substantive work is not programmed within the three-year programme set out in this Local Development Scheme.

name: Annual Community Infrastructure Levy Rate Summary for 2024

notes: We are not intending to prepare a Community Infrastructure Levy charging schedule at the present time.
Derbyshire County Council is not a CIL charging authority
As such the District Council resolved to withdraw the Derbyshire Dales Community Infrastructure Levy Draft Charging Schedule with immediate effect.
Devon County Council is not a Community Infrastructure Levy collecting authority

The Council’s current position is that CIL is not the adopted approach and Doncaster
continue to use negotiated Section 106 Agreements
